description: Try our easy to follow Lemon & Buttermilk Self-Saucing Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemon & Buttermilk Self-Saucing Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, stir remaining caster sugar and 1/2 cup water in a small pan over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Add extra lemon and simmer for 5 minutes or until tender. Combine icing sugar and citric acid in a bowl. Sift over pudding, top with crème fraiche and lemon slices. Serve.

Meanwhile, stir remaining caster sugar and 1/2 cup water in a small pan over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Add extra lemon and simmer for 5 minutes or until tender. Combine icing sugar and citric acid in a bowl. Sift over pudding, top with crème fraiche and lemon slices. Serve.

Meanwhile, stir remaining caster sugar and 1/2 cup water in a small pan over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Add extra lemon and simmer for 5 minutes or until tender. Combine icing sugar and citric acid in a bowl. Sift over pudding, top with crème fraiche and lemon slices. Serve.
